計量法: (けいりょうほう) - the Measurement Law
計量経済学: (けいりょうけいざいがく) - econometrics
計量言語学: (けいりょうげんごがく) - computational linguistics
訊き返す: (ききかえす) - to listen repeatedly/to listen again; to ask a question in return; to ask again/to ask for a repeated explanation
訊く: (きく) - to hear; (usu. 聴く) to listen (e.g. to music); (formal 聴く) to ask/to enquire/to query; to learn of/to hear about; to follow (advice)/to comply with; (聞く, 聴く only)  to smell (esp. incense)/to sample fragrance
訊ねる: (たずねる) - to ask/to enquire/to inquire; to search/to look for/to look into/to investigate
討ち入る: (うちいる) - to break into (a house to kill the master); to raid
討ち取る: (うちとる) - to kill (with a weapon); to defeat an opponent; {baseb} to get someone out; to arrest/to take prisoner
討ち合う: (うちあう) - to exchange gunfire; to exchange shots
討ち果す: (うちはたす) - to slay; to kill
討ち果たす: (うちはたす) - to slay; to kill
討ち止める: (うちとめる) - (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) to hammer into place; (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) (also うちどめる) to end (a performance); (撃ち止める refers esp. to a gun, and 討ち止める to a blade) to kill/to slay/to shoot dead/to cut down
討ち死に: (うちじに) - die in battle; die in action
討ち破る: (うちやぶる) - to break; to smash; to defeat; to destroy; to eliminate
討つ: (うつ) - (usu. 撃つ) to shoot (at); to attack/to defeat/to destroy/to avenge
討取る: (うちとる) - to kill (with a weapon); to defeat an opponent; {baseb} to get someone out; to arrest/to take prisoner
討尋: (とうじん) - minute investigation; thorough inquiry; thorough enquiry
討止める: (うちとめる) - (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) to hammer into place; (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) (also うちどめる) to end (a performance); (撃ち止める refers esp. to a gun, and 討ち止める to a blade) to kill/to slay/to shoot dead/to cut down
討死: (うちじに) - die in battle; die in action
討論会: (とうろんかい) - debate; panel discussion; forum
討議倫理学: (とうぎりんりがく) - discourse ethics
訓: (kun) - instrução, leitura nativa japonesa de um caractere chinês; preceito, lição, ensinamentos de alguém
訓える: (おしえる) - to teach; to inform; to instruct
訓ずる: (くんずる) - to read kanji using its native Japanese pronunciation
訓み下し: (よみくだし) - reading a text from start to finish; transliterating classical Chinese into Japanese
訓む: (よむ) - to pronounce kanji (using the native Japanese reading)
訓令式: (くんれいしき) - official kana romanization system (romanisation)
訓仮名: (くんがな) - (prior to the advent of kana) kanji used to represent readings of words, selected for their kun-yomi, regardless of meaning
訓導: (くんどう) - old word for licensed elementary school teacher; instruction; guiding
訓戒: (くんかい) - warning; admonition; lesson or a phrase that teaches you not to do something
訓民正音: (くんみんせいおん) - (yoji) Hunmin-jongum; the Hankul (Hangul) alphabet (of Korea); the Onmun (Enmun)
訓点: (くんてん) - punctuation marks; guiding marks for rendering Chinese into Japanese
訓示規定: (くんじきてい) - advisory provision; discretionary provision
訓義: (くんぎ) - reading and meaning of a kanji
訓言: (くんげん) - admonitory speech; words of admonition
訓誡: (くんかい) - warning; admonition; lesson or a phrase that teaches you not to do something
訓読: (くんどく) - kun'yomi (native Japanese reading of a kanji); reading a Chinese text (kanbun) in Japanese
訓読み: (くんよみ) - kun-yomi (Japanese reading of character)
訓読文: (くんどくぶん) - kanbun converted into literary Japanese
訓辞: (くんじ) - admonitory speech (e.g. to students); words of admonition
訓釈: (くんしゃく) - explaining the meanings of old words
託かる: (ことづかる) - to be entrusted with; to be asked to
託ける: (かこつける) - to use as an excuse; to pretend that; to use something as an excuse; to make something the pretext (for)
託す: (たくす) - to entrust; to make an excuse of
託する: (たくする) - to entrust; to make an excuse of
託つ: (かこつ) - to complain about; to grumble; to make an excuse for
託つける: (かこつける) - to use as an excuse; to pretend that; to use something as an excuse; to make something the pretext (for)
託児室: (たくじしつ) - nursery; nursing room; baby-care room
託卵: (たくらん) - brood parasitism (planting one's eggs in another bird's nest, as demonstrated by the cuckoo, etc.)
託老所: (たくろうしょ) - old folks' home
記: (ki) - () - escrever, relato, história, crônica, anais, registro
記す: (きす) - to write down/to note/to jot down; (usu. as 心に記す, etc.) to remember
記する: (きする) - to write down/to note; to remember
記入: (きにゅう) - entry; filling in of forms
記号で表す: (きごうであらわす) - to represent by signs
